title: 90/162/EEC: Commission Decision of 23 March 1990 amending Decision 89/244/EEC authorizing certain Member States to provide for exceptions from certain provisions of Directive 77/93/EEC in respect of potatoes for human consumption originating in Turkey (Only the Dutch, French and German texts are authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 23 March 1990
amending Decision 89/244/EEC authorizing certain Member States to provide for exceptions from certain provisions of Directive 77/93/EEC in respect of potatoes for human consumption originating in Turkey
(Only the Dutch, French and German texts are authentic)
(90/162/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: This Decision is addressed to the Kingdom of Belgium, the Federal Republic of Germany, the Grand Duchy of Luxembourg and the Kingdom of the Netherlands.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 23 March 1990.
For the Commission
Ray MAC SHARRY
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 26, 31. 1. 1977, p. 20.
